price: De ki: Gerçekten siz, yeri iki günde yaratanı inkâr edip O’na ortaklar mı koşuyorsunuz? O, âlemlerin Rabbidir.
arabic: ۞ قُلۡ أَئِنَّكُمۡ لَتَكۡفُرُونَ بِٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي يَوۡمَيۡنِ وَتَجۡعَلُونَ لَهُۥٓ أَندَادٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul a-innakum latakfurūna bi-alladhī khalaqa al-arḍa fī yawmayni watajʿalūna lahu andādan dhālika rabbu al-ʿālamīna
